Question: This person met The Knack after a show at his college and introduced himself as the author of "My Bologna".
Hints: Demento appeared in several of this person's earlier videos, such as "I Love Rocky Road" and "Ricky".
In 2008, this person directed the music video for their song "Mixed Up S.O.B.".
This person claims to have enjoyed touring with The Monkees, despite the fact "the promoter gypped us out of a bunch of money.".
